<p style = "font-size:15px; color:black;">Started rowing in 2007</p> 

<p style = "font-size:15px; color:black;">2016 World Rowing Under-23 Champion in BLM2x</p> 

One of the most relevant components in my life has been sport, specially rowing, and here I will show some the results I've had. 

# Rowing 

I started rowing at the end of 2007 and, since then, I have trained and competed at my highest level to achieve my goals in this sport. 

Unfortunatelly, I missed the qualification for the 2016 Olympic Games by one place. However, toghether with my crewmate, I became 2016 World Rowing Under-23 champion in the category of Under-23 Lightweight Double Scull (BLM2x). 

Finally I left the high-level competition in 2019, just before starting my PhD. 

```{r image_blm2x, fig.cap="Spanish LM2x in the 2016 World Rowing Cup I. I am the rower in the bowsite (leftside in the photo).", out.width="60%"}

```
